name: Lenses Prescription
author: Pektsekye

sections.description:
This plugin requires Simple Product Options for WooCommerce plugin to display the prescription options.

This plugin combines multiple Drop-down product options and displays them as the lenses prescription table.

How To Use It:
1. Install the Product Options plugin.
2. Import prescription options from a .csv file.
3. Select which options should be displayed as table on the edit product page.
More details

Main Features:

  • Combines product options and displays them as a table.

Main Limitations:

  • Requires another plugin to display the product options.

You can check a demo page here:
DEMO Page

DEMO 2
Requires this paid plugin to add images, descriptions and to make options dependent on each other.

You can read the installation instructions here:
README

Simple Code Idea:

The idea of this plugin is to keep the base version as simple as possible.
And to add the new features as modifications.

This plugin has just 35 files to make it easy to use and customize. If you need more features check the modifications page hottons.com/lp_modifications

Contact me by email pektsekye@gmail.com if you have questions or need help.

Translators

Available Languages

  • English (Default)

Documentation

Full documentation is available here.
sections.installation:
Requires WordPress 4.7, WooCommerce 3.0 and Simple Product Options for WooCommerce 1.0

  1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate Lenses Prescription from Plugins page.

Contact me by email pektsekye@gmail.com if you have questions or need help.
